title: FIDES VAT Attestation (SD-JWT VC, flat schema)
description: This schema represents the claim set of an SD-JWT based Verifiable Credential for the VAT (Tax) attestation as a single, flat JSON object. It is aligned with the IETF SD-JWT VC data model: generic SD-JWT VC claims (iss, sub, vct, iat, nbf, exp, jti, cnf) are defined alongside the domain-specific LPID claims. Implementations may conceptually treat this as a layered model (base + domain), but the structure is flat for systems that expect a single JSON Schema document, such as current organizational wallet templates.
